tool.name: bedtools MultiCovBed
tool.description: counts coverage from multiple BAMs at specific intervals
tool.command:
#for $i, $bam in enumerate( $bams ): ln -s -f $bam ${i}.bam && ln -s -f $bam.metadata.bam_index ${i}.bam.bai && #end for
bedtools multicov -bed '$input' -bams #for $i, $bam in enumerate( $bams ): '${i}.bam' #end for $strand @OVERLAP@ $reciprocal $split -q $q $duplicate $failed $proper > '$output'

param.name: proper
param.label: Only count proper pairs
param.help: Default counts all alignments with MAPQ > -q argument, regardless of the BAM FLAG field.
